us.phonetic: /v. rɪˈkɔl; n. rɪˈkɔl, ˈrikɔl for 3, 4 ˈrikɔl for 5, 6/, (v. ri kôl′; n. ri kôl′, rē′kôl for 7–9, 12, 13;  rē′kôl for 10, 11)

example.eg: As Janine aged, her recall diminished.
example.egtrans: 随着珍妮年龄的增长，她的记忆力开始衰退。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 回忆, 回想, 记起, 记忆力

dsense.name: recall
dsense.guideword: (manufacturer's notice of unsafe goods) (对残次产品的)

example.eg: There's a recall on this batch of kettles, as they're faulty.
example.egtrans: 因为存在缺陷，这批水壶被召回了。

example.eg: That's where we first kissed, do you recall?
example.egtrans: 那就是我们初吻的地方，你记得么？

trans_examp.trans_cn: 回忆, 回想, 记起, 记得

example.eg: Patrick recalled the long, hot summers of his youth.
example.egtrans: 帕特里克回忆起了年轻时的那个漫长而燥热的夏季。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 回忆起, 想起, 记起

example.eg: The company recalled the faulty kettles.
example.egtrans: 公司召回了一批有质量问题的水壶。

us.phonetic: /v. rɪˈkɔl; n. rɪˈkɔl, ˈrikɔl for 3, 4 ˈrikɔl for 5, 6/, (v. ri kôl′; n. ri kôl′, rē′kôl for 7–9, 12, 13;  rē′kôl for 10, 11)

example.eg: The panel recalled the shortlisted candidates.

us.phonetic: /v. rɪˈkɔl; n. rɪˈkɔl, ˈrikɔl for 3, 4 ˈrikɔl for 5, 6/, (v. ri kôl′; n. ri kôl′, rē′kôl for 7–9, 12, 13;  rē′kôl for 10, 11)

example.eg: We seem to have countless product recalls for items for children.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 产品召回, 产品收回

example.eg: Her total recall of the crime helped the police nab the perpetrator.
